akn:section.akn:heading: Congressional findings and declaration of purpose

akn:content.akn:p: (b) It is declared to be the policy of the United States and the purpose of this chapter to establish during the next eight years an aggressive research, development, demonstration, and technology applications program for converting wind energy into electricity and mechanical energy.
